articles.description: Upcoming sanctions on Russian oil are set to be "really disruptive" for energy markets if European nations fail to set a cap on prices, analysts warned.
articles.content:

articles.description: In an exchange filing, the company said that its board of directors are scheduled to meet on Friday, December 16, to consider and approve the proposal to sub-divide or split the equity shares.Following the update, shares of the smallcap player jumped 5% to Rs…
